Title: Kuttikalundu Sookshikkuka
Actors: Anoop Menon, Bhavana, Sanoop Santhosh, Siddharth Ajith
Plot: Gautam and Shahida belong to two different religions but, no way affects their married life. Neeraj and Niranjan do a playful act for their parents, which accidentally ends up in trouble which creates issues in their family and society.
